name: Human Relations! (Human Management Zoo)
description:
Have you ever wanted to watch little stubby humans make relationships and grow together? Well, now you can! 

Designate eating, sleep quarters, and recreation areas for better convenience of the humans and let them create relationships and even life! Yep, get them happy enough and they will reproduce!

Yes, you read the screenshots right, you can either give the food yourself, having full control or give farming jobs to the little humans! You may want to not give them all farming jobs though so that they can continue making you money!

Humans will walk away when someone is in a bad mood and being rude...
